bios.content:
Rachel is a Michigan local and is excited to return this year to Jafax! She has been cosplaying competitively since 2016 and draws inspiration for her costumes from anime, TV, and gaming. She specializes in armor and prop building and is the happiest with a large weapon in hand.

Ouside of cosplay she works in the medical field as a Pediatric Orthotist. She can't wait to see everyone's talent and creativity!

Instagram: spindrift_cosplay
Facebook: spindrift09
